hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"When anyone of you passes by a garden let him eat therefrom, but he should not carry any away in his garment

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَرَّ عَلَى مَاشِيَةِ قَوْمٍ أَوْ حَائِطٍ هَلْ يُصِيبُ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Passes By The Livestock (Of Some People) Or A Garden - Can He Take Something Fro
